Class MultipathSchedulerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.policies.MultipathSchedulerInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoundRobinMultipathScheduler

    public abstract class MultipathSchedulerInterface
extends Object
    This class defines the interface of the multipath policy scheduler

    1.0

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract List<ChunkInformation> getSchedulingScheme()
      returns the pathID for each chunk
      abstract void informAckArrival(ChunkInformation chunkAckList)
      Informs the scheduler about the bytes received on both the paths
      abstract void informChunkWrite(List<ChunkInformation> chunkWriteList)
      Informs the scheduler which chunk got written to which path
      abstract void initializeScheduler(int startSeqNum, int numChunks, List<Integer> activePathIDs)
      Initializes the scheduler with startSeqNum, numChunks and active path ids Each chunk is 1000 bytes, as defined in MWrappedOutputStream.WRITE_CHUNK_SIZE
